reviewText: This is the very best film about what it's like to be on the inside of a season of Notre Dame football . From the band to the leprechaun , the students to the subway alumni you get the real sense of what the pressure cooker of Notre Dame football is really like . Directed by veteran Paul Doyle and produced by renowned filmmakers Stephen K. Bannon and Bob Potter "Tradition Never Graduates" is a must for every Irish fan .

Excellent dvd.  The Notre Dame tradition is so much more than just football.

All ND fans will ove this dvd.
